channel.title: Run.bat And Other stuff
channel.description:
Someone please help me with these!
Now, i have basically a Blank source (474) i would love it if someone could tell me there code in their Playersave type thing. i want to make it so it will save my stuff on my profile.
Then i would like to learn how to make it log out correctly. With mine when i click "Log-out" on my client it won't logout. But if i use a different client then everything is messed up.
Now there is another problem i have. I want to know how to make NPC's and make them talk, i used to know, it was something about opening NPC handler and adding in the code, just can't remember the code.
And i want to know how to make a Tutorial island type deal. Where you go around and learn how to do what in the game.
I also would like to know how to make the chat box chatting thing. (where you can talk to the NPC's and see the chat head)
I also would like to learn how to make a Custom Shop.
I know this is alot of stuff but i am REALLY new (to 474's). So please Help me!
(I don't care if you explain it all in this [which would be weird] or if you give me a link to a tutorial that EXPLAINS it all clearly)
Thank you and help me!
:D (I have done 317's, i hate them so much.)

item.title: Run.bat And Other stuff
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

found out about Run.bat, but now need help with all the other things!

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat And Other stuff
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Try this for your run.bat (note this is off the top of my head and it, but it should work)

@echo off
java -Xm500m -cp .; Server
pause

I believe that will work for your run.bat. And also, try working on a 317 for starting. They are alot easier to work with and are great for learning how to start programming your own things.

Read full topic
